name: serverless-graphql-potter
description: This is a side project that i used to understand how serverless functions work. I decided to use the potter api as i love the world of harry potter. Built with Gatsby, Netlify functions, Apollo and FaunaDB. Data provided via the Potter API.

name: justask.dev
description: A website to provide answers to seamingly easy questions about web dev. Built with Gatsby and MDX

name: gatsby-theme-pocket
description: A Gatsby theme that adds your saved pocket app articles to your website. Includes filtering by tag. You control all your articles via the mobile app and they are displayed on your site via the theme
